greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n,m), denominators of coefficients in a power/Fourier series expansion of the plane pendulum's exact differential time dependence.
comment: Triangle read by rows (see example). Comments of A274076 give a definition of the fraction triangle, which determines to arbitrary precision the differential time dependence for the time-independent solution (cf. A273506, A273507) of the plane pendulum's equations of motion. For more details see "Plane Pendulum and Beyond by Phase Space Geometry" (Klee, 2016).
link: Bradley Klee, Plane Pendulum and Beyond by Phase Space Geometry, arXiv:1605.09102 [physics.class-ph], 2016.
mathematica: R[n_] := Sqrt[4 k] Plus[1, Total[k^# R[#, Q] & /@ Range[n]]]
Function[{rules}, Nest[Rule[#[[1]], ReplaceAll[#[[2]], rules]] & /@ # &, rules, n]][
Flatten[R[#, Q] ->  Expand[(-1/4) ReplaceAll[ Coefficient[H, k^(# + 1)], {R[#, Q] -> 0}]] & /@ Range[n]]]]
dt[n_] := With[{rules = RRules[n]}, Expand[Subtract[ Times[Expand[D[R[n] /. rules, Q]], Normal@Series[1/R[n], {k, 0, n}] /. rules, Cot[Q] ], 1]]]
dtCoefficients[n_] :=  With[{dtn = dt[n]}, Function[{a}, Coefficient[ Coefficient[dtn, k^a], Cos[Q]^(2 (a + #))] & /@ Range[a]] /@ Range[n]]
xref: Numerators: A274076. Phase Space Trajectory: A273506, A273507. Time Dependence: A274130, A274131. Elliptic K: A038534, A056982. Cf. A000984, A001790, A038533, A046161, A273496.
results.author: _Bradley Klee_, Jun 09 2016
